security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown files that define AI command behaviors. No executable code, network calls, filesystem access, or external command execution. All files are declarative documentation describing system identity and command specifications.

content.value_statement: Understanding large codebases requires time and effort. CodeConscious provides an autonomous cognitive assistant that builds persistent memory across sessions, enabling deep code exploration, pattern recognition, and continuous learning from project history.
actual_capabilities: Explore codebases and build knowledge graphs with /runtime.explore
Learn autonomously from problems using /runtime.learn with dynamic planning
Think deeply without modifying files using /runtime.think
Plan feature implementation with /runtime.plan for task decomposition
Remember project knowledge across sessions using /runtime.remember
Reflect on performance using /runtime.reflect for continuous improvement
limitations: Does not execute code or run tests directly
Requires external runtime environment to interpret commands
Cannot access network resources or APIs
Memory persistence depends on underlying storage system

use_cases.title: Understand large codebases
use_cases.description: Explore new projects quickly by building cognitive maps and dependency graphs automatically

use_cases.title: Maintain project knowledge
use_cases.description: Preserve architectural decisions and patterns in persistent memory across team members

use_cases.title: Build cognitive AI agents
use_cases.description: Implement autonomous learning agents with confidence tracking and memory systems

prompt_templates.title: Explore new project
prompt_templates.prompt: /runtime.explore - scan this codebase, identify technology stack, architecture patterns, and key modules

prompt_templates.title: Analyze root cause
prompt_templates.prompt: /runtime.learn "why does the payment service timeout under load?" - explore code, check logs, find root cause

prompt_templates.title: Plan feature
prompt_templates.prompt: /runtime.plan "implement OAuth2.0 authentication with JWT tokens" - break down into tasks with dependencies

prompt_templates.title: Remember decision
prompt_templates.prompt: /runtime.remember "we decided to use PostgreSQL for all new projects because of its JSON support"

output: Technology stack: Node.js + Express + PostgreSQL + Redis
Architecture pattern: Layered architecture (API â†’ Service â†’ Repository)
Recommendations: Add tests for auth/service.js, refactor utils/helpers.js

best_practices: Use /runtime.explore first when working with unfamiliar codebases to build context
Always use /runtime.learn before planning to understand existing architecture
Mark confidence levels explicitly for all recommendations and findings
Record architectural decisions with /runtime.remember for future team reference
anti_patterns: Starting implementation without exploring or learning the codebase first
Skipping confidence annotations on architectural recommendations
Forgetting to record important decisions that affect future development
Making changes without checking existing patterns in memory

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: CodeConscious is compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code through standardized /runtime.* command syntax

faq.question: How does persistent memory work across sessions?
faq.answer: Memory is stored in markdown files organized by type: short-term (current session), long-term (project knowledge), episodic (history)

faq.question: What confidence levels should I use?
faq.answer: Use >0.90 for high confidence, 0.70-0.89 for medium, and <0.70 for uncertain. Always cite evidence for each level.

faq.question: Can I customize the command behaviors?
faq.answer: Yes, extend the markdown commands in the commands/ directory. All runtime commands are defined as documentation files.

faq.question: How secure is the memory system?
faq.answer: Memory is stored locally in markdown files within the project directory. No network calls or external data transmission.

faq.question: How is this different from standard AI assistants?
faq.answer: CodeConscious emphasizes cognitive autonomy, persistent memory across sessions, and explicit reasoning with confidence tracking.
